AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: orgnium miner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] slaved away in one of the largest orgnium mines on Pyandonea. Many days were spent delving into the depths, searching for even the smallest traces of orgnium.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: cavern excavator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] decided to take on the back-breaking work of excavating caverns. Not only did [PAWN_nameDef] need to be good with a pick, [PAWN_pronoun] needed to be good with a hammer too.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: outpost miner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked at one of the many mines the Maormer had set up in off the coast of Valenwood, with the goal of finding precious minerals. Tensions were always high, as [PAWN_nameDef] and his fellow miners didn't exactly have permission to be there, and at any second arrows could start raining down from between the trees.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: treasure hunter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was an aspiring treasure hunter, which meant [PAWN_pronoun] spent most days digging around in the sand, hoping to find something worth anything. [PAWN_nameDef] did find a few sea serpent scales, and some Altmer bones, but that was about it.
